body_html: FYI, it turns out I needed to make bigger changes to cudnn to make it work with ATen (still in progress), so if other people are blocked on merging cudnn changes, they should do it (and I will spend the day remerging the changes to the new version.)
body_text: FYI, it turns out I needed to make bigger changes to cudnn to make it work with ATen (still in progress), so if other people are blocked on merging cudnn changes, they should do it (and I will spend the day remerging the changes to the new version.)
body: FYI, it turns out I needed to make bigger changes to cudnn to make it work with ATen (still in progress), so if other people are blocked on merging cudnn changes, they should do it (and I will spend the day remerging the changes to the new version.)
